name: disseminator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone or something that spreads or gives out something, especially news, information, or ideas, to a lot of people: disseminator of Bookshops are not like other shops: they are disseminators of ideas. Children are very effective disseminators of viruses. Social media sites are now the leading news disseminators. Related word
disseminate
More examplesFewer examplesA teacher is a coach and mentor as well as a disseminator of knowledge.He is recognized as a leading disseminator of jazz around the world.Bloggers have become key disseminators of news.He speculated that a "Patient Zero" was the first disseminator of the disease.He contributed to the folk music repertoire, both as songwriter and song disseminator.
